item.title: Classic Horror
item.description:
A little collection of classic horror films in one place.

Written in plain Javascript and HTML.

  • Find a demo here

item.title: Anoniem Chat
item.description:
My goal for this project is to create a very simple chat app, where users are anonymous. No logs, cookies or ads.

Written in plain Javascript using the socket.io library.

  • Find a demo here
    • source

item.title: About
item.description:
My name is Michael, a long time computer geek living in Belgium ðŸ‡§ðŸ‡ª but originally from the U.S. ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¸

If you’re curious, this website is where I occasionally share my thoughts and ideas publicly. Also, I will post a project or two, whatever I am creating. I prefer to post here, where I have full control, rather than relying on other platforms who steal your data and sell it. This way, I can express myself freely without worrying about censorship algorithms.
